setEnforceOldQueryProtocol(enforceOldProtocol)
Set the protocol to be used for queries execution. If set to true, the driver will use the (old) 8.4.x protocol. If set to false, the driver will use the newer 9.x protocol.
Parameters:
enforceOldProtocol
